/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on verifying FPOW status for the defenders of Wake Island, including
FPOW status for the defenders of Wake Island
information on the
DD Form 214, Certificate of Uniformed Service
, issued to civilian employees of World War II naval air bases
where to obtain medical records
, and
considering Federal Employees Compensation Act (FECA) benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section A - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section A
